remarks: The group operation (which isn't much more than a magma) of the loop space.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Feb-2015.)
statement:
om1bas.o $e |- O = ( J Om1 Y ) $.
om1bas.j $e |- ( ph -> J e. ( TopOn ` X ) ) $.
om1bas.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. X ) $.
om1plusg $p |- ( ph -> ( *p ` J ) = ( +g ` O ) ) $.
